Summary

Netflix(NFLX0.48%)reported meeting or exceeding all stated 2025 financial objectives, with 16% revenue growth and 30% growth in operating profit. Management guided to 2026 revenue of $51 billion and a 31.5% operating margin, with the pending Warner Bros. Studios and HBO acquisition positioned as an accelerant but representing only a modest shift in overall revenue mix. Advertising is becoming a more significant growth driver, targeted to double to $3 billion in 2026, while investment in global content, new initiatives like podcasts and games, and continued operating leverage remain core to the company’s strategic approach.
